blogPost.excerpt: PDFs are cumbersome and challenging to manage with modern web technologies. The Anvil PDF API simplifies PDF filling, generation, and e-signing into RESTful endpoints, eliminating the pain of working with PDFs.
blogPost.body: PDFs are cumbersome and challenging to manage with modern web technologies. The Anvil PDF API simplifies PDF filling, generation, and e-signing into RESTful endpoints, eliminating the pain of working with PDFs.
blogPost.title: Anvil PDF API - A flexible API for creating, filling, and signing PDFs.
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: PDFs是繁琐的，并且对现代网络技术的管理具有挑战性。Anvil PDF API简化了PDF的填充、生成和电子签名到RESTful终端，消除了使用PDF的痛苦。
localize.tagline: 一个灵活的API，用于创建、填充和签署PDF文件。

localize.description: PDFs是繁瑣的，並且對現代網絡技術的管理具有挑戰性。Anvil PDF API簡化了PDF的填充、生成和電子簽名到RESTful終端，消除了使用PDF的痛苦。
localize.tagline: 一個靈活的API，用於創建、填充和簽署PDF文件。

previous.excerpt: Most live video products are built for an adult-first corporate world not for kids and learning. Prisma LIVE is a new, fun and engaging way for kids to learn and collaborate together virtually.
previous.title: Prisma LIVE - A live learning platform purpose-built for kids

localize.description: 大多数视频直播产品都是为成人优先的企业世界打造的，而不是为孩子和学习而打造的。Prisma LIVE是一种全新的、有趣的、吸引孩子们一起虚拟学习和协作的方式。
localize.tagline: 专为孩子们打造的直播学习平台。

localize.description: 大多數視頻直播產品都是爲成人優先的企業世界打造的，而不是爲孩子和學習而打造的。Prisma LIVE是一種全新的、有趣的、吸引孩子們一起虛擬學習和協作的方式。
localize.tagline: 專爲孩子們打造的直播學習平臺。

next.title: Israel has now fully vaccinated 90% of its population aged 70 and above. Covid-19 deaths are down 77% from their peak and will continue to plummet in the coming weeks, giving the world a glimpse at what the future looks like with herd immunity and the most vulnerable protected. https://t.co/AdSTYTpzMn

localize.full_text: 以色列现在已经为其90％的70岁及以上人口全面接种了疫苗。Covid-19的死亡人数比高峰期下降了77%，并将在未来几周内继续大幅下降，这让世界看到了群体免疫和最脆弱群体得到保护的未来。https://t.co/AdSTYTpzMn。
以色列現在已經爲其90％的70歲及以上人口全面接種了疫苗。Covid-19的死亡人數比高峯期下降了77%，並將在未來幾周內繼續大幅下降，這讓世界看到了羣體免疫和最脆弱羣體得到保護的未來。https://t.co/AdSTYTpzMn。
